abstracts.cdata!:
The Economic Reform Support Loan Project
            aims to restore sustainable economic growth while
            maintaining internal and external equilibria and while
            ensuring increased employment opportunities and protection
            for the most vulnerable sections of society. This is to be
            achieved by transforming the economy from a centrally
            planned system to a more decentralized market oriented
            economy. The proposed program will support the three major
            thrusts of Algeria's development strategy, namely: the
            promotion and diversification of energy and non traditional
            exports to reach a sustainabble external equilibrium and
            improve creditworthiness; more efficient use of the existing
            productive base to meet domestic and export demand at lower
            cost while absorbing Algeria's rapidly expanding labor
            force; and the diversification and improvement of terms of
            external financing to improve external liability management
            and reduce the debt burden in the medium term. Specific
            policy measures will help raise the overall efficiency of
            the economy in line with program goals.
